@tiemeinknits diamonds for baby cardigan page 3 of 9 pattern diamonds for baby cardigan neckline ribbing with purple yarn and 2 5mm needles cast on 89 sts neckline ribbing is worked as follows for a total of 9 row starting on a rs row *note that the 5th row is a buttonhole row rs k10 *p1 k1 repeat from * until 9 sts remain k9 ws k9 *p1 k1 repeat from * until 10 sts remain p1 k9 row 5 buttonhole row girl k10 *p1 k1 repeat from * until 9 sts remain k2 make buttonhole according to buttonhole instructions k to end of row boy k4 make buttonhole according to buttonhole instructions you will now have 7 sts on your right needle k2 *p1 k1 repeat from *until 9 sts remain k9 when a total of 9 row have been worked switch to 3mm needles work 1 ws set up row placing markers to separate the sleeves and the body as follows k9 p10 pm p1 pm p9 these will be sleeve sts pm p1 pm p29 these will be the back body pm p1 pm p9 sleeve sts pm p1 pm p10 k9 yoke the front neckline is shaped with short row using the wrap and turn method while raglan increases are made on every rs row by increasing before and after the raglan stitch markers row 1 rs knit to first m m1r slm k1 slm m1l k sleeve sts to m m1r slm k1 slm m1l k back sts to m m1r slm k1 slm m1l k sleeve sts to m m1r slm k1 slm m1l w&t row 2 p slipping markers until 19 sts remain w&t row 3 k making raglan increases as in row 1 on this and all rs row until 18 sts remain w&t *on this row and following row you will be working previously wrapped stitches when you come to a wrapped stitch pick up the wrap and place it on the left needle and work together with the stitch row 4 p slipping markers until 18 sts remain w&t row 5 k until 17 sts remain w&t row 6 p until 17 sts remain w&t row 7 k until 15 sts remain w&t row 8 p until 15 sts remain w&t row 9 k until 12 sts remain w&t row 10 p until 12 sts remain w&t row 11 k across to end of row row 12 k9 p until 9 sts remain k9 short row shaping for the neckline is now
